1.0.name: wordpress/nic-coming-soon-page
1.0.description:
A Plugin to set Coming Soon page with different options like setting date and time as well as setting social media links.

Features

  • Coming soon plugin setting give facility like site description and title setting on coming soon page.
  • Custom date setting option based on that it will show counter in front site up to that time reach.
  • Meta tag , title and description allows.
  • Easy settings of site logo and favicon icon with use of default media library.
  • Easy Social Icons settings
  • Comes with 2 attractive default theme (light and dark)
  • Even in Coming soon page you can view the site via "site access" keyword that you can define dynamically from settings
  • Tested up to latest version Wordpress 3.5.1.
